text.18_Chapter, 2_Verse, 1_Comment: A matter of mockery, as it says in (Shmuel I, 2:17) "the people disgraced"
text.18_Chapter, 2_Verse, 2_Comment: This is the place where the birthing women sit and so too in (Hosea 13:13) "the bithstool of the children"
text.18_Chapter, 3_Verse, 0_Comment: Perhaps, like it says in(shmuel bet chapter 16 verse 12: perhaps Hashem will see in my eyes:
text.18_Chapter, 6_Verse, 0_Comment: desire. As it says in :(Ezekiel 1, 12): "wherever there will be a will to go"
text.18_Chapter, 9_Verse, 0_Comment: He will incite and tempt you
text.18_Chapter, 15_Verse, 0_Comment: Open, like it says: (Zechariah 12, 4):"He opened my eyes."
text.18_Chapter, 23_Verse, 0_Comment: I dug in another area, from the meaning of (Mishli 30,17) " You shall dig near a river", that thing means dug and split the ground.
text.18_Chapter, 23_Verse, 1_Comment: Wash, like in (Chabkook 3,10)  " The tempest of waters floweth over."
text.18_Chapter, 23_Verse, 2_Comment: From the meaning of sun and dry.
text.18_Chapter, 23_Verse, 4_Comment: It refers to a forest and a river.
text.18_Chapter, 23_Verse, 5_Comment: Referring to siege, and is from the meaning of rock.
text.18_Chapter, 24_Verse, 0_Comment: From the meaning of Shia and dreariness, like in (Eiyov 30, 3) " The holocaust last nigh and from the holocaust."
text.18_Chapter, 24_Verse, 2_Comment: Flowers, like in (Shir Hashirim 7, 13): " Budding pomegranates."
text.18_Chapter, 27_Verse, 0_Comment: And...is the language of noise and crooding:
text.18_Chapter, 27_Verse, 1_Comment: Is the ring is placed in the mouth of the animal whose business bad, hold his hand, and your cheeks and gave Contractsthe animals mouth:
text.18_Chapter, 27_Verse, 2_Comment: And switches. Is a kind of restraint, such as Switch to a donkey:
text.18_Chapter, 28_Verse, 0_Comment: It is that which grows from a seed that has fallen, as it says in (Vayikra 25, 5) : After-growth of your harvest :
text.18_Chapter, 31_Verse, 1_Comment: It will not arrange troops out before the city, because the translation of "before", is "advance upon", and so to as it is written in Micah, chapter 6, verse 6: With what will I advance upon to Hashem.
text.18_Chapter, 31_Verse, 2_Comment: It is a gathering of dirt that is poured along the city walls, to climb up and fight, and so to as it is written in Jeremiah, chapter 6, verse 6: and the poured on Jerusalem a siege ramp.
